engines: Dual-motor electric (480 hp Pure, 620 hp Touring, 819 hp Grand Touring, 1,234 hp Sapphire)
notes: All-electric luxury sedan built in Casa Grande, Arizona. 88-118 kWh battery packs. 900V architecture enables ultra-fast charging. Sapphire tri-motor performance variant produces 1,234 hp. Requires EV-certified technicians for high-voltage systems. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lucid Air article, January 2025 revision.

All-electric three-row luxury SUV (2024+). Built in Casa Grande, Arizona. Shares 900V architecture with Air sedan. Ultra-fast charging capability. Requires EV-certified technicians for high-voltage systems. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lucid Gravity article, January 2025 revision.
